mapper.select: WITH FOLLOWERS AS (SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_ID -- 차은우를 알고 있는 모든 사람. FROM (SELECT FOLLOWEE AS MEMBER_ID FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER = #{_parameter} -- 차은우가 팔로우 하는 사람 AND FOLLOW_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT FOLLOWER FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWEE = #{_parameter} AND FOLLOW_YN = 'Y')) SELECT R.* , M.EMAIL , M.NICKNAME , M.PROFILE_PIC FROM (SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT FOLLOWEE FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM FOLLOWERS) AND FOLLOW_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT FOLLOWER FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWEE IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM FOLLOWERS) AND FOLLOW_YN = 'Y') WHERE FOLLOWEE NOT IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM FOLLOWERS) AND FOLLOWEE != #{_parameter}) R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.FOLLOWEE = M.EMAIL

SELECT F.FOLLOW_ID , F.FOLLOWER , F.FOLLOWEE , F.FOLLOW_YN , M.NICKNAME , M.PROFILE_PIC FROM FOLLOW F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = F.FOLLOWER WHERE F.FOLLOW_YN = 'Y' AND F.FOLLOWEE = #{_parameter}

SELECT F.FOLLOW_ID , F.FOLLOWER , F.FOLLOWEE , F.FOLLOW_YN , M.NICKNAME , M.PROFILE_PIC FROM FOLLOW F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = F.FOLLOWEE WHERE F.FOLLOW_YN = 'Y' AND F.FOLLOWER = #{_parameter}

SELECT F.FOLLOW_ID , F.FOLLOWER , F.FOLLOWEE , F.FOLLOW_YN , M.NICKNAME , M.PROFILE_PIC FROM FOLLOW F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = F.FOLLOWER WHERE F.FOLLOWER = #{followerEmail} AND F.FOLLOWEE = #{followeeEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOLLOW (FOLLOW_ID , FOLLOWER , FOLLOWEE , FOLLOW_YN) VALUES ('FL-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_FOLLOW_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{follower} , #{followee} , 'Y')
